record.dc:title: 58Mg64 Robertson Site, Morgan County, Alabama. Feature #35, refuse pit. This photo was taken after the northern portion of the pit had been removed. The sterile soil in this portion of the pit was markedly different from the dark midden fill in the main part of the pit. See description of photo 54Mg64 (uam01466) for contents of fill.
record.dc:creator: Wayne W. Kraxberger
record.wpa:narrative: Feature #35, refuse pit. This photo was taken after the northern portion of the pit had been removed. The sterile soil in this portion of the pit was markedly different from the dark midden fill in the main part of the pit. See description of photo 54Mg64 (uam01466) for contents of fill.
